allowcallouts.name: AllowCallouts
allowcallouts.description: To use a callout in batch Apex, specify Database.AllowsCallouts in the class definition.

batchable.name: Batchable
batchable.description: The class that implements this interface can be executed as a batch Apex job.

batchablecontext.name: BatchableContext
batchablecontext.description: Represents the parameter type of a batch job method and contains the batch job ID. This interface is implemented internally by Apex.

deletedrecord.name: DeletedRecord
deletedrecord.description: Contains information about a deleted record.

deleteresult.name: DeleteResult
deleteresult.description: Represents the result of a delete DML operation returned by the Database.delete method.

dmloptions.name: DMLOptions
dmloptions.description: Enables you to set options related to DML operations.

duplicateerror.name: DuplicateError
duplicateerror.description: Contains information about an error that occurred when an attempt was made to save a duplicate record. Use if your organization has set up duplicate rules, which are part of the Duplicate Management feature.

emptyrecyclebinresult.name: EmptyRecycleBinResult
emptyrecyclebinresult.description: The result of the emptyRecycleBin DML operation returned by the Database.emptyRecycleBin method.

error.name: Error
error.description: Represents information about an error that occurred during a DML operation when using a Database method.

getdeletedresult.name: GetDeletedResult
getdeletedresult.description: Contains the deleted records retrieved for a specific sObject type and time window.

getupdatedresult.name: GetUpdatedResult
getupdatedresult.description: Contains the result for the Database.getUpdated method call.

leadconvert.name: LeadConvert
leadconvert.description: Contains information used for lead conversion.

leadconvertresult.name: LeadConvertResult
leadconvertresult.description: The result of a lead conversion.

mergeresult.name: MergeResult
mergeresult.description: Contains the result of a merge Database method operation.

querylocator.name: QueryLocator
querylocator.description: Represents the record set returned by Database.getQueryLocator and used with Batch Apex.

querylocatoriterator.name: QueryLocatorIterator
querylocatoriterator.description: Represents an iterator over a query locator record set.

saveresult.name: SaveResult
saveresult.description: The result of an insert or update DML operation returned by a Database method.

stateful.name: Stateful
stateful.description: If you specify Database.Stateful in the class definition, you can maintain state across these transactions

undeleteresult.name: UndeleteResult
undeleteresult.description: The result of an undelete DML operation returned by the Database.undelete method.

upsertresult.name: UpsertResult
upsertresult.description: The result of an upsert DML operation returned by the Database.upsert method.
